name: Goodbye (Max Fefer)
description:
A game for when you are missing your player character and feel the need to say goodbye. Characters are brought into the world by your mind, influenced by the events and people in their campaign, but they are rarely given the closure. This game allows you to check in with your character to see how they are,

Whether or not you realize, your characters are connected. 

They are a part of you. 

 But you must say goodbye.
